description:
Reproduced a simple clock Web 
仿Apple Watch时钟，十分简洁，自动同步本地时间。 

update:更新代码，在左上角添加了一个背景颜色选择器。 You can now find the background color selector in the upper left corner。 

update:再次更新,隐藏了按钮，只有当你的鼠标放到左上角周围，按钮才会滑出来。(某些人强迫症= =)
The button is hidden, only when your mouse is placed in the upper left corner, the button will slip out.
title: Apple Watch  Clock
